references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRF, a foundational model for novel view synthesis that is significantly referenced and built upon in the target paper.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a core technique for generating high-quality images and 3D assets, which is leveraged by the target paper.

references.paper_title: Instant3D: Fast text-to-3D with sparse-view generation and large reconstruction model
references.reason: This paper introduces Instant3D, a state-of-the-art text-to-3D model which is the direct predecessor to the model proposed in this paper and many of the techniques are used directly.
This paper introduces SAM, a highly successful foundation model for image segmentation that is used as a baseline and compared with the target paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Decomposing NeRF for editing via feature field distillation
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for decomposing NeRF for part-level editing, a key task and comparison point to the target paper's method.
